str2: So that, therefore, so then, so as to. From hos and te; so too, i.e. Thus therefore.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
A primary particle of present time; 'now'; also as noun or adjective present or immediate.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural

str2: A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
Flesh, body, human nature, materiality; kindred.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb; to 'know' in a great variety of applications and with many implications.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb; to 'know' in a great variety of applications and with many implications.
No longer, no more. Also ouk eti from ou and eti; not yet, no longer.
